title: Stupidity and Hysteria Abound | 8/2/19
description:
Hour 1 What the hell is going on in Puerto Rico? ...The media is flipping out over the Dems bashing President Obama's record. The left is begging Michelle Obama to run. Joe Biden gets backlash for calling Kamala Harris 'Kid'? ...The World's Top 50 Thinkers of 2019?

Hour 2Saudi Arabia goes progressive. Women can now move about without men? Recalling the time when Colorado Sen. Cory Gardner banned sex? No condom for you! Heaps of hysteria for the masses. ...No dodge ball for you!?

Hour 3

Great news! The NFL season is back with exhibition games. ...Kamala Harris on eliminating employer base insurance. ...LBJ was not only a terrible president, but a terrible human being as well ...Smart cars aren't so smart? ...Fun with fast food?
